question: What was the main feature of Maurya dynasty in India?

explanation:
Decentralized government was the key feature of the Mauryan government. All the powers were concentrated in the hands of the emperor. Though he was the supreme authority of judiciary, civil and military administration, he wasnâ€™t a complete autocrat and his authority was under some restraints.
